scripts.test:watch: nodemon --watch rules --watch tests --watch server.js --ext js,json --exec "node tests/run_golden.js"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n SERVER,TEST "npm:serve" "wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:once: concurrently -k -s first -n SERVER,TEST "node server.js" "wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && node tests/run_golden.js"
scripts.test:smoke: concurrently -k -s first -n SERVER,TEST "node server.js" "wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && node tests/smoke_global.js"
